attributes.action: The UK government to hold a UK Wide vote to dissolve the Scottish Government.
attributes.additional_details: The majority of Scottish People wish to remain British. The Scottish Nationalist government is using every opportunity to achieve Independence from the UK against the wishes of the majority of Scottish People. They use every opportunity to undermine the British Government regardless of the effect on the the majority of Scottish People.
attributes.background: A UK wide vote to be held to dissolve the Scottish Government.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is for the people of Scotland to decide their future.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to hold a referendum in Scotland on ending devolution and returning responsibility for devolved powers to the UK Government and Parliament.
